text: "When a Blind Man Cries" is a 1972 song by British rock band Deep Purple and was originally released as a B-side to the single Never Before. It was recorded during the sessions to their sixth studio album Machine Head in 1971. It has been covered by Bon Jovi and Metallica for their album Re-Machined: A Tribute to Deep Purple's Machine Head. ==References== Category:1972 songs Category:Deep Purple songs Category:Bon Jovi songs Category:Metallica songs Category:Blues rock songs
